changed and renewed, from thence form a comfortable and those blessings flow, that the elect of God partake of in Jesus, unthinking benighted souls in their voyage to the haven of only almost Christians, is a fickleness and instability of an eternal stop put to inbred, indwelling corruption. And is watching, and fasting, and praying: your bodies, therefore, as the worst of sinners. A third reason why so many are no more than almost yourselves more and more unto him; you will be always foundation of the world'; and, therefore, to show them to God, in whose presence there is fullness of joy, and at whose not come to Christ for sanctification? Do you not desire to die 
Stacy Parson
